text: "Next Time" is a 1998 song by Australian singer Marie Wilson and is the debut single from her studio album Real Life. It went to number 21 in Australia. ==Track listing== Australian CD single # "Next Time" – 4:24 # "Searching" – 4:27 # "Next Time" (live/acoustic) – 4:25 * Track three was recorded live on tour with k.d. lang in Sydney, December 1997 ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Debut singles
title: Next Time (Marie Wilson song)
